events.message: The applicant submitted their auto loan application to finance the purchase of a new vehicle that they intend to use for daily commuting.
The loan application was categorised under auto loans based on keywords detected in the submission related to car financing.
A dedicated loan officer was assigned to handle this auto loan request to ensure personalized service through the processing stages.
The loan officer completed an initial review, confirming eligibility and reviewing the applicant's intended vehicle details and loan amount.
Additional documents such as proof of income, vehicle information, and identification were requested from the applicant to proceed further.
The applicant submitted all requested documents on time, including detailed vehicle specs and financial information to support the loan application.
A thorough credit check was performed to assess the applicant's creditworthiness and ability to repay the auto loan as agreed.
The risk assessment report was generated incorporating credit findings and vehicle valuation to determine the risk profile of this loan.
The loan offer, including terms, interest rates, and repayment schedule, was presented to the applicant for consideration and acceptance.
The applicant responded positively, requesting minor clarification regarding repayment terms before proceeding with final approval.
The application was escalated to the senior loan committee due to the applicant’s request for a slightly altered payment schedule.
The senior loan committee approved the auto loan with adjusted terms to accommodate the applicant’s repayment preferences.
Funds were disbursed promptly following approval, enabling the applicant to complete the purchase of the vehicle.
A follow-up was conducted one month post-funding to ensure satisfaction with the loan process and the purchase of the vehicle.
The application was officially closed after all steps were completed and the loan servicing was handed over to the accounts team.
